description.translate: They carry you everywhere so be worthy and give them the best protection.

items.nbt: {display:{Name:"\"§9Ecrin de célérité\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7Ils vous porte partout alors soyez-en\"}","{\"text\":\"§7digne et donnez leur la plus belle des protections.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7They carry you everywhere so be worthy\"}","{\"text\":\"§7and give them the best protection.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7SPD§a3 §7RES§c-1\"}"]}}
